attributes.action: Recognise the selfless bravery and courage of the British Thai Cave rescuers
attributes.background: In June/July 2018 British nationals voluntarily played a key role in the multinational efforts to free 12 children and their football coach who were stranded deep within the Tham Luang cave system in Northern Thailand. Their extraordinary selflessness, bravery and courage should be recognised.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
